page.title: 16First Coleford Scout Group
page.content: { { 1st Coleford Scout group}consists of cubs, scouts, brownies and guides. The subs are forty pence and the money from it goes to the scout hall fund. At camp we study wildlife for our arrow sceme.For{Summer Camp,}we are going to the Brecon Beacons in Wales. We go in sixes, Red, Blue, Yellow, and Green. The scout patrols are Tigers, Cougars, Pumas, Jaguars, and cheetas.Tigers won a three hundred pounds trophy at the{Jamboree 1985 camp site. Some of the cubs are doing their gardeners badge. We try to store our plants that we have planted. I have planted some radishes, potatoes, sprouts, and some spinach. We have been saving money to be sent over for cub scouts in Swaziland. We have a wide game, and we make flour bombs.
